HEADLINE: Headline _en
SECURITY_PRECAUTION: As a security precaution, your session has expired due to inactivity for more than two hours. Please login again,
ACC_REG_SUCCESSFULLY: is successfully registered for an ezyCommerce account. Your Merchant ID is
AWAITING_APPROVAL: Your account is now awaiting approval. This shouldn't take long so we will send you an email as soon as your approval is done. We might contact you if we have further questions relating to your interest.
ONCE_YOR_ACC_APPRVD: Once your account is approved, you can now sign into your ezyCommerce account with the user name and password you chose during signup.
VER_LINK_EXPIRED: Oops! The verification link has expired. Please initiate the
FRM_LOGIN_PG: from the login page if you have not verified
GOTO_LOGIN_PG: to go directly to the login page
ENTER_EMAIL_BELOW: Enter your email address below and we'll help you reset your password
ENTER_SEC_ANS: Enter your security answer given during SignUp
RESET_INSTR_SENT: Reset instruction has been sent to your email
IT_APPEARS_FORGOT_PW: It appears you've forgotten your password.
CREATE_NEW_ONE: To create a new one, just enter and confirm it.
PW_RULE: Password should be 8 - 20 characters long. At least one upper case alphabet, one number and one special character like '@', '_', '!'.
NO_NOTI_TO_DISP: Currently you don't have any notifications to display..
ENTER_MERCH_ORD_INFO: Enter the Merchant Order ID, customer address and packing slip information for the order. Search and add products and enter number of units for each product. Click Next to view available delivery options and estimated charges. Fields marked with asterisk (*) are mandatory.
CLICK_TO_ADD_PROD: Click on the suggested product to add them.
MAKESURE_ISEXPORTABLE: Please make sure the product is exportable for international orders. You can edit the product to change the active & exportable status.
REMOVE_PRODS_HIGHLIGHTED: Remove the products highlighted in red or resolve the issues in order to create order
PACKING_LIST_PREV: for options and Packing list preview
YOUR_ORDER_NOT_SENT_MSG: Your Order will not be sent for fulfillment before this date. If the Process Order Date is today then it will be sent immediately after approval. The date cannot be more than one week in advance.
ID_UNIQUE_ALL_OVER: An identifier for your order assigned by you. The ID should be unique across all Orders.
DISP_ORD_ID_PRINTING_PACK_SLIP: Displayable Order ID is only used for printing on the packing slip which is sent to your customer.
DISP_ORD_DATE_PRINTING_PACK_SLIP: Displayable Order Date is only used for printing on the packing slip which is sent to your customer.
SELECT_DELIVERY_OPTION: Select a delivery option for your order. You can optionally add enhanced liability coverage up to declared value. Review the total estimated charges for the order. Click 'Save Order' to save and edit the order later. Click 'Save & Approve Order' to approve and send this order for fulfillment. Inventory is allocated only when an Order is approved.
NAME: Name
EST_BASED_ON_WGHT_DIMENSION: This is only an estimate based on calculated weight and dimensions. Billing will be based on actuals and may vary.
PROD_WGHT+DUNNAGE: Product(s) weight + 10% dunnage for packaging weight
VOLUME_TIER_DISCOUNTS: Volume tier discounts, if any are not shown here
ADD_ENHANCED_LIABILITY: Add Enhanced Liability(EL) to your shipment for
EL_COVERAGE_NOT_AVAILABLE: EL coverage not available for this Delivery option
CALCULATED_VAL_FROM_PROD_CATALOG: Calculated values are taken from the product catalog.
ORD_DECLARED_VAL_CALC_INFO: Order Declared value is calculated as the sum of product declared value(s) entered in the customs declaration section below
NOT_MORE_THAN_DECLARED_VAL: Cannot be more than declared value. Max EL amount for
CUSTOMS_DECLARATION_MANDATORY: Customs declaration is mandatory for International Orders. Select the products that you want to declare, review the customs information and edit if required. At least one product must be declared for us to ship the order. We will print and enclose the Commercial invoice CN22 / CN23 / CP72 form using the information you enter here.
EXPORTED_OF_RECORD: You will be the Exporter of Record for International orders. We will not hold responsibility for packages held by customs due to improper / false declarations.
ADD_ATLEAST_ONE_PROD_TO_CREATE_ORD: Please add atleast one product to create order
ADD_ONLY_EXPORTABLE_PRODD: Please add only the exportable products for your international orders
INSUFFICIENT_INV_INFO: have insufficient inventory to fulfill this Order. Please replenish your inventory or remove the product(s) that have insufficient inventory. You can continue to save this order and approve it later
SAVE_ORD_AS_DRAFT?: Do you want to save the order as Draft?
MERCH_ORD_ID_REQUIRED: Merchant Order ID is required to save as Draft. You can edit it later
EDIT_CUSTOMER_INFO: You can edit customer address, packing slip information, add and remove products in the order. Click Next to view available delivery options and estimated charges. Fields marked with asterisk (*) are mandatory.
SELECT_DELIVERY_OPTION: Select a delivery option for your order. You can optionally add enhanced liability coverage for the declared value. Review the total estimated charges for the order. Click 'Back' to go back to the previous step. Click 'Save Order' to save and edit the order later. Click 'Save & Approve Order' to approve and send this order for fulfillment. Inventory is allocated only when an Order is approved.
CUSTOMS_DECLATION_MANDATORY_CN22: Customs declaration is mandatory for International Orders. Select the products that you want to declare, review the customs information and edit if required. At least one product must be declared for us to ship the order. We will print and enclose the Commercial invoice CN22 form using the information you enter here.
ADD_ONE_PROD_TO_EDIT_ORD: Please add atleast one product to edit order
ORD_CANCELLED_CANNOT_RESTORED: Once an order is cancelled it cannot be restored
RETREIVING_DATA_PLS_WAIT: We are retrieving your data. Please wait
DOWNLOAD_ORDERS_TEMPLATE_EXCEL: Download the Orders template and open in Excel or any other spreadsheet. Please read and follow the instructions provided in the 'Guide' sheet before filling the data. Once you have uploaded the file, you can monitor the status in Order file upload summary section below
DOWNLOAD_TEMPLATE: Click the button to download the template
ORDER_TEMPLATED_CANNOT_COMPLETED: Order templates containing more than 100 unique orders cannot be completed(requires multiple uploads)
UNPLOAD_COMPLETED_ORDS_FILE_MSG: Upload your completed orders file. Successful uploads are updated directly to the system, This will create an EZY-Order ID for each of your orders. Unsuccessful uploads will generate a validation report containing detailed error messages
CANNOT_UPLOAD_ANOTHER_FILE: You can't upload another file until your previous file completes processing
UNSUCCESS_UPLOAD_REPORT_OPTION: Only unsuccessful uploads have a download report option
TRACK_ORD_ACTIVITY: Track your order activity from here. Click on the tracking number to view the detailed status of your shipment
GET_MORE_DETAILED_TRACKING_MILESTONES: You might be able to get more detailed tracking milestones for your orders
STANDARD_EXPEDITED: Domestic Standard, International Standard and International Expedited - Track the shipments through
DOMESTIC_ECONOMY: Domestic Economy - Track the shipments through
IF_THERE_ARE_NO_EVENTS: If there are no events in
TRACK_SHIPMENT_DIRECTLY: track the shipment directly through the websites of the postal administration of the destination country. For countries with no online tracking updates, SingPost will check with the overseas postal administrations on the status if the addressee did not receive the item after a stipulated time
CURRNT_PAST_BILLING_STATMENTS: You can access current and past billing statements here
CHANGES_SHOWN_HERE: The charges shown here are updated as of
CHARGES_WILL_BE_UPDATED: Charges will be updated when the next statement is generated on
VIEW_TRANSACTIONS_REPORT: Please view the Transaction Report under Reports section to view the latest charges
NOT_REFLECTED_IN_THIS_SUMMARY: will not be reflected in this summary. To view the latest payments please view the payments / adjustments table below
MONTHLY_STATEMENT_GENERATED_ON: Monthly Statement will be generated on the 28th of every month
LAST_12_BILLING_CYCLES: You can download monthly statements for the last 12 billing cycles here. If you want to see statement by transaction, download it from the Reports section under Transactions
NO_PAYMENTS_OR_ADJUSTMENTS: There are no payments or adjustments
UPGRADE_EVERY_30DAYS: Here you can upgrade once every 30 days. Please call customer service to downgrade your plan
MAX_ORDERS_PER_MONTH: Max. no. of orders per month
BASICS_TO_GET_STARTED: All the basics you need to get started
ADDITIONAL_FEATURES_TO_EXPAND_SELL: Additional features to expand your sell
ENHANCED_FEATURE_AND_FLEXIBILITY: For enhanced feature and flexibility in scale
ULTIMATE_ALL_IN_ONE: Ultimate all in one package with ultimate scale and personalized support
SUPPORT_F2F_TRAINING: Email,Live chat,Telephone Support,Face to face Trainings
SELECTED_POWER_SELLER: You have selected Power Seller Plan
CHANGE_EFFECTIVE_IMMEDIATELY: The change will be effective immediately and the billing will be prorated accordinlgy
MANAGE_CONNECTIONS_TO_EXT_SALES_CHANNELS: You can manage connections to external sales channels - marketplaces and shopping carts here
NO_SALES_CHANNEL_CONNECTED: You don't have any sales channel connected
ADD_SALES_CHANNEL_BY_CLICKING: Start by adding sales channels by clicking on your desired marketplace. Once authorized we will automatically pull orders from all your stores and ship it to your customers based on your preferences
IMPORTED_ORDERS_DIRECTLY_SENT_FOR_FULFIL: Imported Orders will directly be sent for fulfillment after x number of days.  Orders that have discrepancies will override and be placed under Pending for further action
AUTO_UPDATE_SHIPMENT_TRACKING: Automatically update Shipment status and tracking number
EMAIL_ORDER_IMPORTED: Email me once an order has been imported
EMAIL_NOTI_ORDER_PULLED: An email notification to the registered email will be sent when an order is pulled from this store
RUN_REPORTS_OF_ACC_ACTIVITY: You can run reports of your account activity here. You can download all data or use filters to limit results to specific ones
YEAR_COMPANY_FOUNDED: Year in which company was founded
NUMBER_OF_ONLINE_CHANNELS_CURRENTLY_SELL: Number of online channels currently selling in
NO_OF_OVERSEES_COUNTRIES_SELLING_IN: No. of oversees countries currently selling in
CLOSE_DELETE_ACC_PERMANENTLY: This action will close/delete your account permanently
ALL_INV_REMOVED_FROM_WAREHOUSE: All inventory must be removed from the warehouse
EMAIL_PENDING_PAYMENTS: An email will be sent regarding pending payments
ADD_ONE_PROD_TO_CREATE_SHIPMENT: Please add atleast one product to create shipment
CAN_CHANGE_ACC-PW: You can change account password, modify contacts details and manage your account status here
CHOOSE_MODULES_TO_VIEW: Choose which modules can be viewed
ALLOW_VIEW_SELECTED_MODULES: Allows the user to view selected modules
ACCESS_CREATE_MODIFY_PERFORM: Access to create, modify and perform actions on products
ACCESS_CREATE_INBOUND_PLANS: Access to create inbound plans, cannot ship Orders
ACCESS_CREATE_MODIFY_ORDERS: Access to create and modify orders, cannot approve for Order Fulfillment
ACCESS_APPROVE_ORDERS_FULFILLMENT: Access to approving orders for fulfillment
ACCESS_VIEW_OUTSTANDING_AMOUNT: Access to view the outstanding amount and download monthly bill
ACCESS_ADD_MODIFY_CHANNELS/MARKETPLACE: Access to add and modify channels/marketplaces
CONFIG_EMAIL_PREFERENCES: You can configure your email preferences here. This will apply to all users of this account
EMAIL_PROD_UPLOAD_COMPLETED: Email me when Product upload is completed
VALIDATION_REPORT_PRESENT_ATTACHMENTS: The validation report will be present in attachments if any
EMAIL_PROD_DIMENSION_UPDATED: Email me when a Product's dimension is updated by EZC
EMAIL_PROD_INVENTORY_FULFILLABLE_FALLS_B: Email me when Product Inventory Fulfillable falls below the corresponding Inventory Alert Level
EMAIL_SHIPMENT_UPLOAD_COMPLETE: Email me when Shipment upload is completed
EMAIL_SHIPMENT_STATUS_CHANGES_INTRANSIT: Email me when a Shipment status changes to 'In Transit'
EMAIL_ORD_UPLOAD_COMPLETED: Email me when Order upload is completed
EMAIL_ORD_STATUS_PEDING_TO_HASISSUES: Email me when an Order status changes to Pending - Has Issues
EMAIL_ORD_STATUS_PENDING_UNAPPROVED: Email me when an Order status changes to Pending - Unaprroved
EMAIL_ORD_STATUS_TO_INPROCESS: Email me when an Order status changes to 'In Process'
EMAIL_ORD_STATUS_TO_SHIPPED: Email me when an Order status changes to 'Shipped'
EMAIL_ORD_STATUS_TO_DELIVERED: Email me when an Order status changes to 'Delivered'
EMAIL_DAILY_SUMMAY_ALL_PENDING_ITEMS: Email me a daily summary on all Pending items (Shipments and Orders)
EMAIL_MONTHLY_INV_READY: Email me when monthly invoice is ready to view
INTERACTIVE_PRICING_CALC_MSG: Use the interactive pricing calculator to get an estimate of Handling and Storage rates based on your volumes. These rates are only for your reference and does not reflect actual usage for your account
AVE_NO_OF_OUTBOUND_PER_MONTH: Average number of outbound orders per month
AVE_NO_OF_UNITS_EACH_ORDER: Average number of units in each Order
STORAGE_CYCLE_COUNT_INV_MGT: Storage, Cycle count and Inv. Mgt
STORAGE_CAPACITY_REQUIRED_CBM: Storage capacity required in cubic metre (cbm)
OFFERS_MULTIPLE_DELIVERY_OPTIONS: ezyCommerce offers multiple delivery options for Domestic and International orders
DOMESTIC_ECONOMY_RATES_START: Domestic Economy rates start from SGD 3.94 per order
DOMESTIC_STANDARD_RATES_START: Domestic Standard rates start from SGD 4.99 per order
INTERNATIONAL_DELIVERY_HAS_ECONOMY: International delivery has Economy, Standard and Priority options to more than 220 countries. Rates vary by weight and destination and starts from SGD 7.95 per order
CONNECT_EBAY_SELLER_ACC: Connect to your eBay Seller Account
CAN_SELL_EBAY_AND_EZYCOMMERCE: With ezyCommerce, you can sell on eBay and use ezyCommerce as the fulfillment solution for your eBay orders. In order to do this, you need to add your eBay seller account on the ezyCommerce platform
SYNC_FOLLOWING_INFO_WITH_EBAY: We can synchronize the following information with eBay
START_POLLING_EBAY_SERVERS: Once you are connected, we will start polling eBay servers periodically to check for new orders under your account. All new and modified orders will be downloaded into your ezyCommerce account
ORDER_SHIPPED_INFO_PUSHED_TO_EBAY: When an order is shipped, status and tracking information is pushed to eBay
FOLLOW_PROCEDURE_BELOW: Follow the procedure below to add your eBay account to ezyCommerce
REDIRECTED_EBAY_WEBSITE: you’ll be directed to the eBay.com website. Simply enter your eBay credentials and it will link up. eBay has unified logins between all their individual websites for different countries
ENTER_REQUIRED_ACC_INFO: Enter the required account information – your username and password. EBay uses oAuth security authentication mechanism hence nobody including us will not have access to your account password
GRANT_ACCES_FOR_EZYCOMMERCE: to grant access for ezyCommerce to access your eBay account and you’ll be redirected back to the ezyCommerce Connections page
MAKE_SURE_EBAY_LISTING: You need to make sure that your eBay listings have the same
IMPORT_ORD_FROM_EBAY: so that when we import an order from eBay, we can identify the relevant products to ship. Other forms of product identification such as Product ID, ezy-SKU will not work. Only products with matching ‘Merchant SKU’ will be identified. If you are selling multiple variants of an item, click
KNOW_PROCESS_SETUP_VARIANT_SKUS: to know the process to setup variant SKUs in your eBay listing
UPDATE_SHIPMENT_TRACKING_INFO: If you would like to update shipment tracking information back to eBay, check
CONNECTIONS_PAGE_INFO: in the Connections page. Once your orders have shipped, we will automatically push tracking information into Ebay and change the order status to “Shipped”
SUPPORT_ONLY_DIRECT_EBAY_CONNECTION: At this time, we support only Direct eBay connection. We do not support eBay via Paypal IPN connection
SHOPIFY_STORE_CLICK_CONNECT: Enter you Shopify store domain and proceed to click ‘Connect’. You will be redirected to Shopify’s site to authorize ezyFulfillment by providing your login credentials
ASSIGN_YOUR_SUBUSER_FROM_PREDEFINED_ROLE: Assign your sub-user from a set of pre-defined roles to manage your business. You can change the previleges of the sub-users after creation
CHOOSE_USER_PERMISSIONS_FOR_SUBUSER: Choose one or more user permissions for your sub-user
ALLOW_USER_EDIT_RESPECTIVE_MODULE: Allows the user to edit the respective module
ALLOW_USER_CREATE/EDIT_PERFORM_ACTIONS: Allows the user to create / edit and perform product related actions on products
ALLOW_USER_CREATE/EDIT_SHIPMENT_AND_ORDE: Allows the user to create / edit Shipment and Orders. The user can perform fulfillment related actions on products
ALLOW_USER_ADD/MODIFY_SALES_CHANNELS: Allows the user to add / modify sales channels, preferences and download reports. Allows the user to add / edit all sections under My Account except User Accounts
SELLING_ALL_ABOVE_PERMISSIONS: Selecting all the above permissions gives complete access to your account except User Accounts
EXISTING_CARD_INFO: Your existing card information is shown here. If you would like to edit it or add a new card, you need to delete the existing card info
SHOW_EXISTING_CARD: Show Existing Card - Temporary Link to Show static Page
AUTHORIZE_VALIDATE_INFO: Once you enter the card information, we will authorize and validate the information
SITE_SSL_ENCRYPTED: Our site is SSL encrypted and your card information is safe with us
CONFIGURE_SHIPPING_PREFERENCES: You can configure your default shipping preferences here. You can turn on automatic order fulfillment to automatically approve external orders upon receipt
ORDERS_AUTO_APPROVED: When activated, Orders will be automatically approved on your behalf by applying the preferences in Order defaults. Orders will be put on hold if it matches the below criteria
HOLD_ORDERS_ABOVE_RETAIL_VALUE: Hold orders above retail value greater than SGD
EXISTING_ORD_APPLIED_ORDERS: Existing order defaults will be applied to the orders
DEFAULT_APPLIED_NEW_ORDER: Defaults will be applied to new order. You can still edit the order before approval
ADD_ENHANCED_LIABILITY_COVERAGE: Add Enhanced Liability (EL) coverage on the total Declared Value for
DOWNLOAD_ORDERS_BY_DATE_RANGE: Here you can download all orders  by specifying a date range. Maximum date range allowed is 3 months from the current date. Please call client service and raise a request if you need older records
CAN_DOWNLOAD_10_PREV_FILES: You can download up to 10 previously generated files
NO_DOWNLOAD_HISTORY: You don't have any download history
CAN_SET_OTHER_PREFERENCES: You can set other preferences such as customizing packing list message and setting default label sizes for Shipments
ENTER_NAME_PRINT_ON_PACKING: Enter the name to be printed on the packing List at the header level
IDENTIFY_BRAND_NAME_IN_MARKET: This is typically your brand name and how the cutsomers identify you in the market
FOOTER_INFO_PRINT_ON_PACKING: Enter the footer information to be printed on the packing list (if any)
MSG_TO_CONVEY_CUSTOMERS: It can be any message that you want to convey to your customers
LABEL_PRESELECTED_ON_CREATE_SHIPMENT: This will be the default label size that will be pre-selected when you create a Shipment. Contact Client Service if you want to order label supplies
DOWNLOAD_ALL_TRANSACTIONS_BY_CUSTOM_DATE: Here you can download all transactions by specifying a custom date range. Maximum date range allowed is 12 months from the current date. Please call client service and raise a request if you need older records
ADJUSTMENTS_AND_PAYMENTS: Adjustments and payments, if any are not shown in the transactions report
DOWNLOAD_ALL_PRODS_OR_FILTERED_DATA: Here you can either download all products or download filtered data. Apply the filter and proceed to Download.By default Product Category is All and Active is selected. The report will be in CSV format which can be used for file uploads
DOWNLOAD_COMPLETE_PRODS_CATALOG: This will download the complete Products catalog ignoring the filters
DOWNLOAD_ONE_SHIPMENT_AT_A_TIME: You can download only one Shipment at a time.  Enter either the Shipment ID or Shipment Plan Name that you entered during the creation process
PROVIDE_ENTIRE_SHIPMENT_ID: You have to provide the entire Shipment ID or the Shipment Plan Name. Partial matches will not be accepted
ADD_EDIT_REMOVE_OTHER_USERS: You can add, edit and remove other users for your account here
NO_SUB_USER_SETUP: You don't have any sub-user set up for this account
CREATE_SUB_USER_FOR_SUBORDINATES: Create a sub user account for your sub-ordinates to manage your business. You can control their permissions at all times
PLS_SET_MERC_CONTEXT: Please set the merchant context in the merchant table to add payments or adjustments. Once you set the context data for that merchant will be reflected here
VIEW_MERC_DETAILS: You can view merchant details here
NO_OF_ONLINCE_CHANNELS_SELLING: Number of online channels currently selling
MANUALLY_FILL_FILEDS: Manually fill up the fields to create a product. No two products must have the same Merchant SKU. Apply Customs declaration information to be used in future orders. Fields marked with asterisk ( * ) are mandatory
ALL_FRAGILE_PRODS_MUST_PACKED: All fragile products must be packed in such a way that they pass the standard 4-foot drop test
CREATE_PROD_WITHOUT_PROD_ID_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to create the Product without a Product ID (EAN/UPC/JAN/ISBN)?
MAKESURE_PHYSICAL_BARCODE_AVAILABLE: Please make sure that the Merchant SKU physical barcode is available on the product
IDENTIFIER_FOR_PROD: An identifier for the product, assigned by you.  The SKU must be unique across all your Products
LONGEST_SIDE_OF_PRODS: Longest side of the product should be given as length. Max. Length 105cm and L+2W+2H should not exceed 200cm
NOTIFY_FULFILLABLE_HITS_ALERT_QUANTITY: We will notify you once the fulfillable quantity hits the alert quantity. Giving 0 will alert you once it is out of stock
ONLY_CERTAIN_INFO_CAN_EDITED: Only certain information can be edited. Product defaults cannot be edited after product creation. Fields marked with asterisk (*) are mandatory
TRACK_PROD_ACTIVITY_FROM_HERE: Track your product activity from here
ONLY_PRODS_HAVE_INV_HISTORY_SHOWN_HERE: Only Products that have inventory history are shown. Products that were never sent to the warehouse even once will not be shown
DOWNLOAD_PROD_TEMPLATE: Download the Products template and open in Excel or any other spreadsheet. Please read and follow the instructions provided in the 'Guide' sheet before filling the data. Once you have uploaded the file, you can monitor the status in Products file upload summary section below
TO_START_DOWNLOAD_IMPORT_TEMPLATE: To get started, please download the import template in one of the formats below. The file contains guidelines on how to fill the template. You can upload a maximum of 500 products at one go
DONT_WORRY_IF_FILE_CONTAINS_ERROR: Once you've added your products to the template, upload it here. Don't worry, if your file contains error, we will generate a status report to help you correct those errors
VIEW_STATUS_OF_FILE_HERE: View the status of the file here. If your upload has some problems, you can download a status report which will help you to correct the errors. The same file can be upload again in Step 2
NO_ACCESS_VIEW_PAGE: Sorry, You don't have access to view the page you requested. Please use different credentials or contact Client Service
WE_REDESIGNED: We have redesigned our site and it looks like the page you want has gone on vacation
HERE_LITTLE_MAP: Here's a little map that might help you to get back on track
LEAV_PAGE_CONF: Are you sure you want to leave this page?
ARCHIVE_PROD_CONF: Are you sure you want to Archive this Product?
CREATE_INACTIVE_PROD_CONF: Are you sure you want to create Inactive Product?
MAKE_INACTIVE_CONF: Are you sure you want to make product as Inactive?
CANCEL_SHIPMENT_CONF: Are you sure you want to cancel this shipment?
RESTORE_SHIPMENT_CONF: Are you sure you want to restore this shipment?
CANCEL_ORDER_CONF: Are you sure you want to cancel this order?
RESTORE_ORDER_CONF: Are you sure you want to restore this order?
CLIENT_SERVICE_TEAM_WILL_CONTACT_YOU: Our client service team will review your account closure request and will contact you if there are outstanding issues regarding your account. All outstanding balances must be paid in full before account can be fully closed. A new account cannot be created with the same details as the closed account. Your data and reports may not be saved once your account has been closed. Please contact Client Service if you are unsure before proceeding to close your account
UPDATE_TRACKING_STATUS_CONF_MSG: Are you sure you don't want to update tracking status back to your sales channel? Your customer will not be aware of the order status & tracking number
REMOVE_SALES_CHANNEL_CONF_MSG: Are you sure you want to remove this sales channel? You can no longer receive orders from this channel. If there are outstanding Orders in ezyCommerce from this channel, their status will not be updated
DELETE_USER_CONF: Are you sure you want to delete the user?
CHECK_ATLEAST_ONE_PROD: Please check at least one product to perform any product action
SIGNEDIN_ACC_MSG: Now that you are signed in to your ezyCommerce account, we'd like to highlight some important points before you send in your inventory and place your orders. It's important you understand this clearly so you can plan ahead and we can always ensure a great experience for your customers
INBOUND_SHIPMENTS_RCVD_BY_WAREHOUSE_MSG: For all Inbound Shipments received by the warehouse on business day 0 by 4pm - goods will be received and ready for fulfilment
BUSINESS_DAY2_INFO: on business day 2 by 4pm. However, we strive to receive all shipments within 1 business day and update you as soon as shipment is closed
FOLLOW_SHIPMENT_PREP_GUIDELINES: Please follow the shipment preparation guidelines to ensure a smooth and timely receiving process
OUTBOUND_ORDS_APPROVED_INFO_MSG: For all Outbound orders approved on business day 0 by 9am, Orders will be shipped out of warehouse
BUSINESS_DAY1_INFO: on business day 1 by 5pm. However, we strive to ship out all orders received until 8 AM on business day 1 on the same day
DEPENDING_UPON_THE_DELIVERY_METHOD_MSG: Depending upon the delivery method chosen by you, the delivery service level agreement will start from the time your order is shipped out of our warehouse. For example, when using Domestic Standard delivery, all orders shipped out by 5 PM on business day 0 will get delivered latest on business day 1, by 6 PM
SLAS_GUIDELINES: section for detailed SLAs and other guidelines
READY_TO_SELL_ONLINE: Now you're all set, get started and get ready to transform the way you sell online
LEAVE_AS_YOUR_DETAILS: Leave us your details and we will get in touch with you as soon as possible
COPY_RIGHTS: @ 2014 SINGAPORE POST LIMITED. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED
ENTER_INBOUND_SHIPMENT_PLAN_MSG: Enter the Inbound Shipment Plan Name and Ship From address. Search and add products you wish to send to the warehouse. Choose who will label the units in the shipment. Click Create Shipment to create an Inbound Shipment ID. Fields marked with asterisk (*) are mandatory
REMOVE_PROD_HIGHLIGHTED: Remove the products highlighted in red or resolve the issues in order to create shipment
CANNOT_EDIT_ALL_INFO_MSG: You can edit all information other than Inbound Shipment Plan Name. Add or remove products and choose who will label the units in the shipment. Click Next to proceed to the next step and update Inbound Shipment details
ADD_ONE_PROD_EDIT_SHIPMENT: Please add atleast one product to edit shipment
UPDATE_INBOUND_SHIP_DETAILS_MSG: You can update the Inbound shipment details and print labels here. We advise you to update the Carrier name and Carrier Tracking Number if you have this information. We will start receiving the shipment only after the complete shipment has arrived. The total number of cartons we receive should match what you enter here. Please provide the carton number visible from the outside
PROD_WILL_READY_FOR_ORD_FULFILLMENT: Products will be ready for order fulfillment by
IF_SEND_SHIP_BEFORE: if you send the Shipment before
MAKE_SURE_FOLLOWING_TASKS_COMPLETED_MSG: Please make sure that the following tasks have been completed before you send the Shipment. This will allow us to receive and process your Shipment without any delays.
SHIPPING_RIGHT_PRODS: You are shipping the right products (SKUs) as given in the Shipment.
UNITS_SHIPPED_EACH_PROD_MATCHES: Number of units shipped for each product matches with the Shipment quantity for each product.
PROD_LABELS_PRINTED_PASTED_EVERY_UNIT: Product Labels have been printed and pasted on every unit (if you chose 'Merchant' under Who labels?).
PROD_LABELS_PRINTED_PASTED_EVERY_EXT_CAR: Shipment Box labels have been printed and pasted on every external carton in the shipment.
ALL_ITEMS_SECURELY_PACKED: All items are securely packed with suitable packaging/filler materials - without any open/damaged cartons.
ALL_CARTONS_FULLY_SEALED: All cartons are fully sealed with brown tape or transparent tape.
CARTON_ENTERED_MATCHES_CARTONS_SHIP: Total number of cartons you enter in this page matches with the total number of cartons you ship to us.
INBOUND_SHIPMENT_NOTI_RCVD_WAREHOUSE: For Inbound Shipment notices received by the warehouse before the cut-off time at business day 0 by 4pm -  goods will be received and ready for fulfilment latest by business day 2 by 4pm. However we strive to receive all shipments within 1 business day.This SLA does not apply if the Inbound shipment has problems such as damages and quantity discrepancies
DOWNLOAD_SHIP_TEMPLATE_OPEN_EXCEL: Download the Shipment template and open in Excel or any other spreadsheet. Please read and follow the instructions provided in the 'Guide' sheet before filling the data. You can upload only one shipment at a time. Once you have uploaded the file, you can monitor the status in Shipment file upload summary section below.
UPDATED_WAREHOUSE_RECEIVES_SHIPMENT: Will be updated once warehouse receives your Shipment
TRACK_SHIP_ACTIVITY: Track your shipment activity from here.
WE_EXCITED_MSG: We’re really excited that you’re interested to sign up for ezyCommerce. Please have the following information ready before you begin
VALID_EMAIL_ACCESS_TO: A valid email that you have access to
REG_COMPANY_NAME_ADDR: Your registered company name and address
VALID_CONTACT_NO_ALLOWS_REACH_YOU: A valid contact number that will allow us to reach you during the registration process
THIS_WILL_YOUR_USERNAME_MSG: This will be your username. Kindly make sure that you can access this email. We will send a verification link to this email after you SignUp
NEED_TO_REG_COMPANY_IN_SG: You need to be a registered company in Singapore and provide a valid UEN / GSTN
CHOOSE_SECURITY_QUESTION_MSG: Please choose a security question and an answer that is simple to remember yet difficult to be guessed by others
GIVE_US_CONTACT_DETAILS_MSG: Give us your contact details below. Our Merchant Support Team might use the information you enter to contact you.
PLS_PROVIDE_MORE_INFO_MSG: Please provide us more information about your business to help us serve you better.  You may be eligible for the ezyCommerce-SPRING SME subsidy grant which will provide you rebates up to 70% of your monthly fulfillment charges
APPLY_FOR_THIS_GRANT: To apply for this grant, you should be
REG_COMPANY_IN_SG_INFO: Registered company in Singapore and have at least 30% local shareholding
COMPANY_GROUP_ANNUAL_SALES_INFO_MSG: Company group annual sales not more than $100mil (OR) company group employment size not more than 200 workers
APP_REVIEWED_DAYS_INFO: Your application will be reviewed within 3 working days and you will be informed on the outcome. SP eCommerce reserves the right to revise applicable eligibility terms, accept or refuse the grant without providing any reason
NOT_MEET_ELIGIBILITY_CRITERIA_MSG: If you do not meet the eligibility criteria, you can still go ahead and sign-up for ezyCommerce without the grant
WISH_TO_APPLY_SME_INFO: I wish to apply for the ezyCommerce-SME subsidy grant and confirm that I meet the above criteria for the application
PLS_PROVIDE_BELOW_INFO: Please provide the below information for our reference
TELL_MORE_ABOUT_YOUR_BUSINESS_MSG: Tell us a little more about your business. This will help us to serve you better and customize special offers or packages exclusively for you
URL_CURRENTLY_SELLING: URL of Website where you are currently selling
NUMBER_OF_OVERSEAS_COUNTRIES_SELLING: Number of overseas countries currently selling
EXISTING_SINGPOST_CORPORATE_CUSTOMER: Are you an existing Singpost Corporate customer?
ALL_ENTERED_INFO_SHOWN_HERE_MSG: All the information you entered in Steps 1 and 2 are shown here. Please make sure they are correct and agree to the standard T&Cs before you register. Click on the Back button to modify any information. If you are all set, click Sign Up Now to complete your registration.
APPLIED_SME_NOTIFIED_OF_APP: If you have applied for an ezyCommerce-SPRING SME subsidy grant, you will be separately notified on the outcome of this application.
NO_OF_OVERSEAS_COUNTRIES_SELLING: No. of overseas countries currently selling
READ_AGREE: I have read & agreed to the
READY_TO_GET_STARTED: you're almost ready to get started!
TANK_FOR_SIGNUP_MSG: Thank you for signing up for an ezyCommerce account. An activation email has been sent to
PLS_CLICK_ACTIVATION_TO_VERIFY_MSG: Please click on the activation link to verify your email. You can login to your account as soon as your account has been approved by the administrator
DINT_RECEIVE_EMAIL_MSG: Didn't receive an email?  Please check your junk folder and add ezyCommerce domain to your safe senders list. If you still didn't receive the email, you can submit a request to
GOT_QUESTIONS_CONTACT_INFO: Got questions? Contact us at +65 6229 5979 or email us at support@ezycommerce.com

insuranceUpdateSuccess: Enhanced Liability (EL) charges has been updated successfully
orderCountFetchError: Oops.. an error occurred when fetching Orders count under each status. Please try again by refreshing the page.

orderCarrierServiceError: Oops..an error occurred when fetching the Delivery options for this order. Please try again by refreshing the page.
orderApproveError: Error in approving order, please try again later.
noCarrierAvailable: Sorry. We could not find any suitable delivery option for your order. This can be due to weight limitations, destination Country or the combination of Products in your Order. If you think this is an error, please contact client Service.
headerProductActive: Active Products can be used to create Shipments and Orders. Active Products cannot be made inactive if there is existing inventory in the warehouse, impending Shipment or open orders.
headerProductInActive: Inactive products are not allowed for creating Shipments and Orders. Products can be made inactive because they are not sold anymore or temporarily discontinued or seasonal products etc. You can change a Product to active status at any time.
headerProductAll: Create and manage your product catalog here. Add products one at a time by typing the product information or in bulk by uploading a file using our standard template. Once Products are created and activated, you can use them to create shipments, orders and do more
noProductsHeaderTextActive: You don't have any Active products in your catalog.
noProductsHeaderSubTextActive: Start by adding products by filling out the product information manually or bulk upload products using a spreadsheet.
noProductsHeaderTextInactive: You don't have any Inactive products in your catalog.
noProductsHeaderSubTextInactive: You can move your discontinued or seasonal products to inactive status.
noProductsHeaderTextAll: You don't have any products in your catalog.
noProductsHeaderSubTextAll: Start by adding products by filling out the product information manually or bulk upload products using a spreadsheet.
headerShipPending: Inbound Shipment consists of a list of active products and corresponding inventory (number of units) that you want to send to the warehouse. Your pending shipments are shown here. Click the Edit icon to modify the shipment details. Once you have prepared and labeled the shipment, you can update the shipment status to In Transit.
headerShipInTransit: We are expecting to receive your shipment on the estimated arrival date. You can still print and paste labels if you have not sent your shipment. We will receive the inventory once the complete shipment has arrived and update the shipment status.
headerShipReceived: We have received your shipment. You can view the shipment receipt which shows the number of units received against each product in the shipment. If we received any unidentified products in your shipment, our client service will contact you for further disposition.
headerShipViewInTransit: We are expecting to receive your shipment on the estimated arrival date. You can still print and paste labels if you have not sent your shipment. We will receive the inventory once the complete shipment has arrived and update the shipment and inventory status.
headerShipViewReceived: We have received your shipment. You can view the shipment receipt which shows the number of units received against each product in the shipment. If we received any unidentified products in your shipment, our client service will contact you for further disposition.
headerShipCancelled: All cancelled inbound Shipments are listed here for your reference. Cancelled Shipments are shown only for your reference and cannot be restored.
noShipmentsHeaderTextPending: You don't have any Shipment in Pending status.
noShipmentsHeaderSubTextPending: Create a Shipment to send/replenish inventory. Read our Shipment guide on the best practices employed for labelling and packaging.
noShipmentsHeaderTextInTransit: You don't have any Shipment in In transit.
noShipmentsHeaderSubTextInTransit: Send your inventory to the warehouse by creating a Shipment.
noShipmentsHeaderTextReceived: You don't have any Shipment in received status. Send one now!
noShipmentsHeaderTextCancelled: You don't have any Shipment in Cancelled status.
headerOrdersAll: All your orders from different channels and multiple statuses are shown here. Orders can be created one at a time or in bulk by uploading a file using our standard template. If you are connected to a sales channel, your orders will be automatically imported. Click on other views in the left to filter orders by specific statuses.
headerOrdersHasIssue: Has Issues orders have one or more problems that need your attention before they can be approved. All issues pertaining to this order are listed below. This can be missing or invalid inputs, unidentified products or insufficient inventory for products in the order. Inventory will not be reserved for products inside these orders until they are approved.
headerOrdersUnapproved: Unapproved orders are awaiting your approval before they can be processed and fulfilled. Inventory will not be reserved for products inside these orders until they are approved.
headerOrdersInprocess: In Process orders have been approved by you earlier and can no longer be edited. These orders are being processed in our system and waiting for fulfillment.
headerOrdersUnderFull: Fulfillment orders have been sent to the warehouse and are being picked and packed for your customers. A packing list will be enclosed in every order with the date, order id, header and footer message as provided. Refer to the order history at the bottom for detailed tracking milestones.
headerOrdersShipped: Shipped orders have been dispatched from our warehouse using the delivery method selected by you. You can find the tracking number under the Order specification. Refer to the Order History for detailed tracking milestones. Some delivery methods may not provide detailed tracking information.
headerOrdersDelivered: Delivered orders have been successfully received by your customers.
headerOrdersDraft: Draft orders are orders saved by you earlier which are not yet validated. Click the Edit icon to continue to edit, create and approve the order. Inventory will not be reserved for products added inside draft orders.
headerOrdersCancelled: All cancelled orders are listed here for your reference.
headerOrdersUndeliverable: RTS (Returned to Sender) are orders that never reached your customer and have been returned to the warehouse. A physical check for package level damages is done and put away for fulfillment.
headerOrderViewHasIssues: Has Issues orders have one or more problems that need your attention before they can be approved. All issues pertaining to this order are listed below. This can be missing or invalid inputs, unidentified products or insufficient inventory for products in the order. Inventory will not be reserved for products inside these orders until they are approved.
headerOrderViewUnapproved: Unapproved orders are awaiting your approval before they can be processed and fulfilled. Inventory will not be reserved for products inside these orders until they are approved.
headerOrderViewInProcess: In Process orders have been approved by you earlier and can no longer be edited. These orders are being processed in our system and waiting for fulfillment. Refer to the order history at the bottom for detailed tracking milestones.
headerOrderViewUnderFulfilment: Fulfillment orders have been sent to the warehouse and are being picked and packed for your customers. A packing list will be enclosed in every order with the date, order id, header and footer message as provided.
headerOrderViewShipped: Shipped orders have been dispatched from our warehouse using the delivery method selected by you. You can find the tracking number under the Order specification. Refer to the Order History at the bottom for detailed tracking milestones. Some delivery methods may not provide detailed tracking information.
headerOrderViewDelivered: Delivered orders have been successfully received by your customers. Refer to the order history at the bottom for detailed tracking milestones.
noOrdersHeaderSubTextAll: You can create orders manually through the user interface or by uploading a spreadsheet.
noOrdersHeaderTextHasIssues: You don't have any Orders in Has Issues status. All Clear!
noOrdersHeaderTextUnaproved: You don't have any Orders under Unapproved.
noOrdersHeaderSubTextUnapproved: You can create an order and leave it in unapproved to revisit it later.
noOrdersHeaderTextInProcess: You don't have any Orders in In Process.
noOrdersHeaderSubTextInProcess: We are super-fast in approving your orders.
noOrdersHeaderTextUnderFulfillment: You don't have any orders in Fulfillment status.
noOrdersHeaderTextShipped: You don't have any orders in Shipped status.
noOrdersHeaderTextDelivered: You don't have orders in Delivered Status.
noOrdersHeaderTextDrafts: You don't have any orders in Drafts.
noOrdersHeaderSubTextDrafts: Saving a draft allows you to save an order and revisit it later.
noOrdersHeaderTextCancelled: You don't have any Orders in Cancelled status.
noOrdersHeaderTextUndeliverable: You don't have any Orders in Undeliverable status.
